Pre-Game Insights: Philadelphia will attempt to build upon its three-game win streak with a victory over Sacramento.
The 76ers are 8-8 on the road. Philadelphia is 2-1 in games decided by less than 4 points.
The Kings score 114.8 points per game, 4.5 more points than the 110.3 the 76ers give up.
The Kings average 107.2 points per game, 6.5 fewer points than the 113.7 the Kings allow to opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 76ers are 2-1 in games decided by less than 4 points.
The Kings have gone 7-12 in home games.
Sacramento is 2-6 in games decided by 3 points or fewer.
Others: De'Aaron Fox is averaging 26.5 points, 5.1 rebounds, 6.3 assists and 1.6 steals for the Kings.
Kelly Oubre Jr. is averaging 12.7 points and 5.7 rebounds for the 76ers.
The Kings have 4-6 in their last 10 games, averaging 116.0 points, 45.6 rebounds, 28.0 assists, 7.7 steals and 4.3 blocks per game while shooting 46.8% from the field.
The 76ers have 7-2 in their last 10 games, averaging 111.3 points, 41.2 rebounds, 22.2 assists, 10.7 steals and 4.0 blocks per game while shooting 46.6% from the field.
